attributes.action: Stop legal aide for Treason and/or Terrorist charges
attributes.additional_details: Stop legal aide for people charged with either Treasonable or Terrorist acts. All assets to be confiscated by the state and used by their defence teams. Reason: the accused have turned against this country. Limited funds will mean that trials will not drag on.  If found guilty the accused will forfit their citizenship, Rights and all benfits. The confinement terms will be for Treason - 30 years and for Terrorist acts(supportive or active) - 40 years.  For "life" if lives are lost.
